Package de.eldoria.schematicbrush.brush.config

Interface PlacementModifierRegistration

All Superinterfaces:
Registration<PlacementModifier,List<ModifierProvider>>
public interface PlacementModifierRegistration extends Registration<PlacementModifier,List<ModifierProvider>>
Represents a Registration at a Registry or similar pattern, which allows to register PlacementModifier with multiple ModifierProviders
